info.name: Smart Stop/Reload/Go Button
info.description: Combine Stop, Reload, and Go into one dynamic button.
info.additionalInfo: REQUIREMENTS 0. This style, installed in Stylish. 1. Smart Stop/Reload extension. 2. userChromeJS extension. 3. Smart Stop-Reload-Go Button.uc.js script for userChromeJS. NOTES • If the Stop and Reload buttons disappear for some reason, add them back to the toolbar and restart Firefox (or create a new window). • If the height of the button is off for your GTK+ theme, tweak the values at the end of the style (as is indicated there).
